name: Flitter Inc.
description:
The year is 1982. 

Humanity is at the peak of progress.

And you've just landed a job at Flitter — the hottest technology company on the planet. 


* * *

Primarily told through tweet-like micro-texts, Flitter Inc. is an interactive fiction for Android that explores the ideas of social media, human agency, and the quickly-approaching end-game of the human race.

As a Content Reviewer for Flitter, your job is to ensure that the micro-messaging platform remains friendly, respectful, and spam-free. 

Sign in to your terminal and see what the world is saying — then decide if the world deserves its voice.

As a Flitter Inc. employee, you'll have the chance to:

  • Explore a familiar yet strange world expressed through a thousand voices.
  • Listen to the office gossip of a company growing ever-more detached from reality.
  • Discover the truth behind the Flitter organization.
